director.name: 维托·帕尔米耶 Vito Palmieri

this_title: Non più non ancora - Ritratti preadolescenti
introduction: A documentary built from a series of themes that dominate the life of pre-adolescents. Relationships with ourselves, with our peers and with adults; friendship, love, school, bullying are just some of the key words that have introduced us into the lives of children and that constitute the backbone for the narration of our stories.
chinese_title: Non più non ancora - Ritratti preadolescenti
